column4: Does anyone know why an SWF file would play slowly in FF3?  The addon's I have loaded are fine, as they're also on my XP Dual Boot, and the SWF File isn't slow on there.
which version of flash are you using?
you can check by going to firefox 3 -> tools -> addons -> plugins and checking it out
you said a swf file right?
the problem isn't java if it is a SWF file.  It's Adobe Flash that plays it, so we need to find out if that is up-to-date and if so reinstall it
in the 'plugins' on FF3, check out the shockwave flash plugin
hmm, that's the current version.  Do you have a link to the swf that won't work?
i have it locally loaded, so I could continue playing the game
ok, now I understand you a bit better.  I've never had any luck playing locally loaded SWFs that I have acquired through FF3, windows or ubuntu.  Maybe someone else will chime in with better info
good luck, if it's a video, I'd check VLC Player
it plays perfectly in windows (the same swf), and the website itself is slow too refefer (in linux)
